net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.widget

Class AbstractUiWidget.AccessHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.client.ui.base.widget.AbstractUiWidget.AccessHelper
  • Enclosing class:
    AbstractUiWidget<VALUE>

    public static class AbstractUiWidget.AccessHelper
extends Object
    This inner class gives access to methods not visible in the public API.
    ATTENTION:
    It is reserved for internal usage and should therefore never be used by regular users. Otherwise compatibility might break with any release update.
